yelp_reviews.author: Xiaoxiao L.
yelp_reviews.review:
Vanessa is a wonderful real estate agent!
She is very knowledgeable, yet always listen to our concerns and is never pushy at all. She made buying our home in the competitive Bellingham market so much easier to navigate!  (Our first offer on our dream house was accepted!) She is always fast at responding to our questions and never hesitated to find more information from the sellers if needed. Overall I highly recommend her as a realtor!

yelp_reviews.author: Anne P.
yelp_reviews.review: Vanessa is an excellent real estate agent who, along with her partner, Mike, guided us through the maze of steps required to purchase our first home. They were both responsive and enthusiastic, and answered our many, many questions with thoughtfulness and expertise. I would highly recommend Vanessa to anyone looking for a new home!

yelp_reviews.author: James P.
yelp_reviews.review:
We recently purchased a condo in Bellingham. From the process of locating the perfect condo to finally closing on it, Vanessa was there every step of the way. Provided great advice on all the decisions. Some things we would of never thought about. Was there for us 7 days a week to answer any question or concern. She always listened well and made recommendations with our interests in mind. Bottom line is Vanessa truly cares about her clients and is a knowledgeable realtor.
Love our new condo!!! She was key in making it happen. We highly recommend Vanessa.

yelp_reviews.author: Edward W.
yelp_reviews.review: Vanessa made the sale of our old home and purchase of our new home a seamless process and about as stress-free as it could have possibly been.  She is knowledgeable, professional, an incredible communicator, and just an overall fun person to work with.  It feels as if the effort she put into helping us get our dream home is the same effort she would have expended for her own family.  Vanessa, Mike, and the rest of the Bellwether team are absolutely incredible and I would recommend them without hesitation to anyone looking to buy/sell a home.

yelp_reviews.author: Cheyanna S.
yelp_reviews.review: Vanessa Parry is the best!  We are a coast guard family and got stationed in Bellingham, Wa.  We had to quickly find a home to buy while we were stationed in Northern California.  Vanessa worked hard and fast for us.  I never once felt like she was trying to "sell" us on a house that wasn't the perfect fit.  I felt like she totally got what we were looking for and made it happen.  She went to house after house, sending us videos and in depth descriptions as we weren't there to see them in person.  Vanessa is honest, personable and thoughtful.  Not only would I highly recommend Vanessa, I will never go through another agent other than her.  She made our first home buying experience easy and special.  Thank you Vanessa!!!!
